name: Hello Pollution!
description: Hello Pollution is a 2D physics puzzle game about a dysfunctional waste disposal company.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP2 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 750 Ti or equivalent with 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or equivalent with 4GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
